snippet: The service is expected to be announced as early as Wednesday, and reflects agreements the company has made with the three major music labels.
abstract: Google is expected to introduce subscription music feature to compete against fast-growing streaming services like Spotify at its Google I/O annual conference for software developers; service will be connected to Play, Google's online media hub.
lead_paragraph: The service is expected to be announced as early as Wednesday, and reflects agreements the company has made with the three major music labels.

headline.main: Google Expected to Start a Competitor to Spotify
headline.print_headline: Google Expected to Start A Competitor to Spotify
